verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7911>forget<s%> not my <S%H8451>law<s%>; But let thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>:
For <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, And <S%H7965>peace<s%>, will they add to <S%H3254>thee<s%>.

Let not <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H7194>thee<s%>: Bind them about thy <S%H1621>neck<s%>; <S%H3789>Write<s%> them upon the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>:
So shalt thou <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> In the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H120>man<s%>.
Trust <S%H982><s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with all thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>, And <S%H8172>lean<s%> not upon thine own <S%H998>understanding<s%>:
In all thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> <S%H3474>him<s%>, And he will direct thy <S%H734>paths<s%>.
Be not <S%H2450>wise<s%> in thine own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>:
It will be <S%H7500>health<s%> to thy <S%H8270>navel<s%>, And <S%H8250>marrow<s%> to thy <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
Honor <S%H3513><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with thy <S%H1952>substance<s%>, And with the <S%H7225>first-fruits<s%> of all thine <S%H8393>increase<s%>:
So shall thy <S%H618>barns<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7647>plenty<s%>, And thy <S%H3342>vats<s%> shall <S%H6555>overflow<s%> with new <S%H8492>wine<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3988>despise<s%> not the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; Neither be <S%H6973>weary<s%> of his <S%H8433>reproof<s%>:
For whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> he <S%H3198>reproveth<s%>; Even as a <S%H1>father<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> in whom he <S%H7521>delighteth<s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H4672>findeth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, And the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H6329>getteth<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
For the <S%H5504>gaining<s%> of it is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H5505>gaining<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, And the <S%H8393>profit<s%> thereof than fine <S%H2742>gold<s%>.
She is more <S%H3368>precious<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies<s%>: And none of the things thou canst <S%H2656>desire<s%> are to be compared unto <S%H7737>her<s%>.
Length <S%H753><s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> is in her right <S%H3225>hand<s%>; In her left <S%H8040>hand<s%> are <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%>.
Her <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H5278>pleasantness<s%>, And all her <S%H5410>paths<s%> are <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
She is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> to them that lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon <S%H833>her<s%>: And happy is every one that retaineth <S%H8551>her<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H3245>founded<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; By <S%H2451>understanding<s%> he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
By his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H8415>depths<s%> were broken <S%H1234>up<s%>, And the <S%H7834>skies<s%> drop <S%H7491>down<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, let them not <S%H3868>depart<s%> from thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; <S%H5341>Keep<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion<s%>:
So shall they be <S%H2416>life<s%> unto thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>, And <S%H2580>grace<s%> to thy <S%H1621>neck<s%>.
Then shalt thou <S%H3212>walk<s%> in thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%>, And thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall not <S%H5062>stumble<s%>.
When thou liest <S%H7901>down<s%>, thou shalt not be <S%H6342>afraid<s%>: <S%H7901>Yea<s%>, thou shalt lie down, and thy <S%H8142>sleep<s%> shall be <S%H6149>sweet<s%>.
Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%>, Neither of the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, when it <S%H935>cometh<s%>:
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will be thy <S%H3689>confidence<s%>, And will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H3921>taken<s%>.
Withhold <S%H4513><s%> not <S%H2896>good<s%> from them to whom it is <S%H1167>due<s%>, When it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> to do <S%H6213>it<s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> not unto thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and come <S%H7725>again<s%>, And <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%>; When thou hast it by <S%H3426>thee<s%>.
Devise <S%H2790><s%> not <S%H7451>evil<s%> against thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, Seeing he <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> securely by <S%H983>thee<s%>.
Strive <S%H7378><s%> not with a <S%H120>man<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>, If he have <S%H1580>done<s%> thee no <S%H7451>harm<s%>.
Envy <S%H7065><s%> thou not the man of <S%H376>violence<s%>, And <S%H977>choose<s%> none of his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For the <S%H3868>perverse<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But his <S%H5475>friendship<s%> is with the <S%H3477>upright<s%>.
The <S%H3994>curse<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; But he <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
Surely he <S%H3887>scoffeth<s%> at the <S%H3887>scoffers<s%>; But he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto the <S%H6035>lowly<s%>.
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%>; But <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall be the <S%H7311>promotion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
